name: 2048 Forever After
description:
2048 – is a classic number merge puzzle game that is very simple to use and easy to addict. Challenge yourself on several boards at the same time. Deal with a rush of 16 tiles spawning at once per move. You have never seen 2048 game like this before!

— How to play —
⚙️ Customize the game rules to suit your interests
🧩 Choose one of the new unusual boards
🦾 Swipe up / right / down / left to shift all numbers
🧮 Merge same tiles to get the highest number
🎉 Reach 1024 .. 2048 .. 4096 or more

— Features —
🌙 Night theme
🔙 Infinite undo moves
2️⃣ Configurable amount of new tiles
🔢 Boards of different shapes and sizes
♾️ Keep playing after 2048 is reached
🔊 Sound and vibration response
🎥 Fresh design and smooth animation
🚧 No gimmicks or false positives
🦄 Autosave, high scores, entertainment

— By the way —
👨‍💻 To keep the 2048 game free, it contains minimum ads
⭐️ We always welcome any of your ideas and suggestions
